author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Adrian Crum "FreeMarkerWorker class has a bug in its caching logic" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1170)
I applied the NewFreeMarkerWorker.patch. It's commited as CTR, I tested it one week without any problems.

author: ngn
msg: Allow all versions from 2.0.7 and forward.

author: jorton
msg: * dbd/apr_dbd.c (apr_dbd_open): Recent glibc defines open() as a macro
(as permitted by POSIX); prevent expansion of such here.

author: andreas
msg: Added usecase to force the check-in of documents.

author: jorton
msg: * dbd/apr_dbd.c (apr_dbd_open): Recent glibc defines open() as a macro
(as permitted by POSIX); prevent expansion of such here.
